message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $180?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. However, I have to make a profit, so I can only go as low as $160. Would you be willing to meet me at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
I'm starting to think we're close, Bob. I can meet you halfway between $140 and $160, so I'm willing to offer it to you for $150. What do you think?
